graph.description: Enable RSH - Do not do this!
graph.changelog:
$Log: base-rsh.xml,v $ Revision 1.3 2009/01/08 23:36:01 mjk - rsh edge is conditional (no more uncomment crap) - add global_attribute commands (list, set, remove, dump) - attributes are XML entities for kpp pass (both pass1 and pass2) - attributes are XML entities for kgen pass (not used right now - may go away) - some node are now interface=public
Revision 1.2 2006/06/05 17:57:32 bruno first steps towards 4.2 beta
Revision 1.1 2005/03/01 00:22:24 mjk moved to base roll
